<h3 id="X12575">X(12575)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: HUTSON INTOUCH TO 5th CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-a+b+c)*(2*a^3+3*(b+c)*a^2+2*(b-c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12575) = 5*X(1)-X(1770) = 3*X(1)-X(4292) = X(950)-3*X(3058) = 3*X(1770)-5*X(4292) = 2*X(1770)-5*X(4298) = X(1770)+5*X(10624) = X(3057)+3*X(3058) = 3*X(3057)+X(10950) = 2*X(4292)-3*X(4298) = 3*X(6738)-4*X(12433)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(1).</p>
<p>X(12575) lies on these lines: {1,7}, {8,4082}, {10,497}, {11,3634}, {12,12571}, {30,10105}, {40,1058}, {55,474}, {56,12512}, {57,5493}, {65,6744}, {72,519}, {144,9797}, {145,12527}, {226,3303}, {388,9580}, {392,10866}, {452,4853}, {496,6684}, {498,10171}, {515,9856}, {517,6738}, {551,3601}, {726,11997}, {938,7991}, {946,3295}, {960,5853}, {1000,5881}, {1191,3755}, {1210,5119}, {1385,10386}, {1479,6957}, {1617,12511}, {1698,5274}, {1699,3947}, {1837,3626}, {2098,3635}, {2136,2551}, {2269,3294}, {2478,3895}, {2646,3636}, {3085,3817}, {3086,10164}, {3244,3486}, {3333,6361}, {3339,10580}, {3361,9778}, {3452,3913}, {3485,10389}, {3488,7982}, {3555,5850}, {3621,8275}, {3624,5281}, {3625,5727}, {3718,3883}, {3746,5443}, {3811,10388}, {3813,5745}, {3828,11238}, {3832,5726}, {3871,6745}, {3877,6737}, {3880,5795}, {3881,10391}, {4652,11240}, {4656,5813}, {4847,5250}, {4857,10039}, {4915,12541}, {5048,10543}, {5173,12564}, {5223,6764}, {5225,9578}, {5252,9670}, {5289,12437}, {5290,9812}, {5698,6762}, {5703,11522}, {5704,9588}, {5722,11362}, {5759,6766}, {5919,6284}, {6666,9710}, {6700,8715}, {8162,10404}, {8390,12574}, {9669,10175}, {9799,9949}, {9804,9898}, {9845,12246}, {10165,11373}, {10172,10593}</p>
<p>
X(12575) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1,10624}, {145,12527}, {950,3057}, {6284,10106}<br>
X(12575) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (65,6744), (4298,1), (6743,960)<br>
X(12575) = X(389)-of-Hutson-intouch-triangle<br>
</p>
X(12575) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,20,4315), (1,390,4314), (1,962,3671), (1,4294,4297), (1,4295,5542), (1,4302,4311), (1,4309,4304), (1,4312,11037), (1,9589,7), (1,9785,4342), (40,1058,11019), (55,12053,1125), (390,9785,1), (497,1697,10), (2478,3895,6736), (3057,3058,950), (3057,9848,72), (3085,9614,3817), (3486,7962,3244), (4314,4342,1)<br>
